title: The Priestly Line of Levi
summary: This chapter details the genealogy of the Levites, including the priestly line through Aaron. It also outlines the responsibilities of the Levites in temple worship and lists their towns.

faq.question: Why is the tribe of Levi important?
faq.answer: Because the Levites were assigned to serve in the temple and offer sacrifices.

faq.question: Who came from the line of Aaron?
faq.answer: The priests of Israel, who carried out sacred duties.
